price: Say to those who disbelieve: “You will soon be defeated and gathered into Hell. What a terrible resting place!”
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
